p: The increasing demographic evolution over the last century alongside the industrial development of highly populated countries, such as India or China, has led to an increased demand for raw materials. This need entails a great environmental risk associated with the overexploitation of natural resources and the release of industrial waste. Nowadays, new habits to minimize the environmental impact have emerged, including a growing interest on the use of natural and bio-based products (Sardella et al., 2015). In addition, different valorization processes of waste are being considered as a mean to generate more efficient and tailored materials.
